content: {{knowledge objective |Identifiant=OIC-075-03-B |Item_parent=Smoking addiction |Item_parent_short=Smoking addiction |Rank=B |Title=Know the definition of the electronic cigarette |Description=Basic principle of operation |Rubric=Definition |Contributors= |Order=3}} * Mixture (propylene glycol + nicotine + water + flavourings + glycerol) propelled in the form of vapour and inhaled. * To date, no adverse reactions or cases of intoxication have been reported. * Possible allergic reactions * Considered as consumer products.

question.title: What is the basic principle of operation of an electronic cigarette?
question.description: The definition of an electronic cigarette

option_a.title: A mixture of propylene glycol, glycerol, and flavourings propelled in the form of vapour and inhaled

option_b.title: A mixture of nicotine, water, and flavourings propelled in the form of vapour and inhaled

option_c.title: A device that uses only propylene glycol and glycerol as propellants
option_c.description: A common misconception about electronic cigarettes

option_d.title: A mixture of propylene glycol, nicotine, and flavourings propelled in the form of vapour and inhaled
option_d.description: A distractor that is similar to the correct answer

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: The correct letter of the correct option
